Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 12 Kilesagocchaka » 12.6 Kilesasaṃkiliṭṭhaduka » 12.6.7 Pañhāvāra
12.6.7.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Kilesagocchaka
Kilesasaṃkiliṭṭhaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānulomapaccanīya
95.
4048Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi…pe…  namagge tīṇi…pe…  navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
<< Suddhaup12.6.7.4 Paccayapaccanīyānuloma >>
